name: Graveyard Smash (itch) (justicecold)
description:
In Graveyard Smash, collect different body parts from the 'Parts Generator' and assemble your very own zombie horde!  Like any mad scientist, you can try swapping out limbs (even arms for legs!) as different body parts will make your zombies stronger or faster!

RAISE your army and fight your way to victory!
